product_name: Roxy Close Out Neoprene Hoody Vest - Women's
long_description: Designed to get wet and stay warm, the women's Roxy Close Out Neoprene Hoodie Vest offers stylish insulation when you're paddleboarding, kayaking, surfing and otherwise playing in the water. 1mm neoprene with a smooth inner and outer lining guards your body heat against chilly wind and spray. Fabric helps protect skin from UV light with a UPF rating of 50+. Adjustable hood features a hole for your ponytail. Side zip pockets offer plenty of storage. Hand wash the women's Roxy Close Out Neoprene Hoodie Vest in cold water and lay flat to dry.
short_description: Designed to get wet and stay warm, the women's Roxy Close Out Neoprene Hoodie Vest offers stylish insulation when you're paddleboarding, kayaking, surfing and otherwise playing in the water.
